COPYING:
This is a stub file. This package has not yet had its complete licensing information compiled. Please see the individual source files for details on your rights to use and modify this software.
Please submit updated COPYING files to the Xorg bugzilla:
https://bugs.freedesktop.org/enter_bug.cgi?product=xorg
All licensing questions regarding this software should be directed at the Xorg mailing list:
http://lists.freedesktop.org/mailman/listinfo/xorg
